name: Perspective
description:
Zoom, Perspective, Super Secret Settings for FabricMC.
Included Custom Shaders:
- Shareware (Credit: MCLegoMan)
- Grayscale (Credit: MCLegoMan)
Shader Fixes:
- Bits (Credit: Nettakrim)
- Blur (Credit: Nettakrim)
- Flip (Credit: Nettakrim)
- Outline (Credit: Nettakrim)
You can add custom Super Secret Settings using resource packs in both the Perspective and Souper Secret Settings layouts.
